fields.name: Typhoon Claws
fields.description: +30 Attack Damage +20% Attack Speed +4% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Phantom Hit: Basic Attacks grant Malice Charges upon hitting an enemy. After 3 stacks, your next 3 attacks will be at maximum attack speed, but deal -50% damage. Charges expire after 3 seconds. ''That is not the pounding of the rain.''
